long_description: The Timbuk2 Copilot Wheeled Luggage - 22" is an ultralight rolling suitcase with sleek styling and a clamshell opening that offers efficient packing. Large front zipper gives you easy access to contents inside the main compartment. Expandable top stash pocket is accessible in overhead bins. Front zippered pocket holds up to a 13 in. laptop. Sturdy, smooth skateboard wheels and an extending handle make it easy to roll. Made from durable nylon and reinforced tarpaulin fabric. Reinforced handles on all sides let you grab and go quickly. Timbuk2 Copilot Wheeled Luggage - 22" has an integrated ID window.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Copilot Wheeled Luggage - 22" is an ultralight rolling suitcase with sleek styling and a clamshell opening that offers efficient packing.
